title: Welcome To The Foundation Podcast Hub
content:
[[include theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include component:image-block name=WTTF_New_Logo|caption=Cover Art by Serene Snowbun and Kitschycreates on Instagram]]

[[collapsible show="+ Open Old Show Log" hide="- Close Archive"]]

**SCP Involved:** //Numerous//

**Date:** May, 2023 - August, 2023

**Location:** Nanisivik Naval Facility, Site-230

**Description:** Beginning in the summer of 2023, the Site Director of Site-230, Dr. Robin, began the production of a series of training clips for new field agents being trained at the site. These clips were designated to go alongside traditional training, and provided background on anomalous entities and incidents that the Site Director felt would be useful for the training.

These files included entities that would otherwise be locked behind O5 clearance. Investigation into how these files were accessed by the site director, and the danger such files pose to the greater Foundation, was ongoing prior to the completion of the series.
[[/collapsible]]

++ Incident Report

**SCP Involved:** //Numerous//

**Date:** May, 2024 - Ongoing

**Location:** Nanisivik Naval Facility, Site-230

**Description:** During May of the year 2024, the Site Director of Site-230, Dr. Robin, appeared on-the-air reporting that an XK-Class End of The World scenario has occurred around October, 2023. With their world destroyed, starting in May, they began the production of a radio series hosted from Site 230 to give official Foundation File Information, on-the-ground Field Reports, and Ask-and-Answer Segments to help the general populous survive the end of the world.

This show appears to be weekly, airing every Monday at 6pm Atlantic (5pm Eastern). Given the fact that the world still exists, it is believed that this radio show is hosted from a parallel universe, and is anomalous in nature. Investigation into it is ongoing. Previous log has been archived due to this discovery.

Below are two clips from the show, recovered by our Anomalous Radio Activity team.

**Clip 1: Sharkpunching**
[[include :snippets:html5player
    |type=audio
    |url=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/wttf-podcast-hub/Sharkboxing
]]

**Clip 2: Death of a Dying God**
[[include :snippets:html5player
    |type=audio
    |url=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/wttf-podcast-hub/Dying_God
]]

**Clip 3: The Avian Guardians**
[[include :snippets:html5player
    |type=audio
    |url=https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/wttf-podcast-hub/Avian
]]

**Clip 4: SCP-000**
[[include :snippets:html5player
    |type=audio
    |url=https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/wttf-podcast-hub/SCP-000
]]

The following tag-lines has been often-repeated within the show:
@@ @@
[[=]]

++ Welcome To The XK, those of you lucky enough to still be alive.



++ Tune in to your guide against all things anomalous, every Monday at 6pm Atlantic.



++ ##red|Stay Hidden. Stay Safe. Stay Alive.##

[[/=]]

@@ @@
------
@@ @@
++ Site-230 Personnel of Note

[[tabview]]
[[tab Dr. Robin]]

**Name:** Dr. Robin

**Voice Actor:** Gaia Noseworthy

**Position:** --Ex---Site Director of Site 230, Coordinator of Welcome To The Foundation radio show

**Clearance Level:** 4 (Class B)

**Birthday:** April 12^^th^^, year unknown.

**Strengths:** Rapid response, research, hard science, presentation.

**Weaknesses:** Extreme levels of stress, work-consumed (sometimes literally).

**Segment:** File Readings - Reading and presentation of various Foundation files on anomalous objects, entities, and events, for the purpose of educating the listener on events that could occur to them.

**Details:** Externally confident and internally anxious, open to non-standard ideas with a strict scientific approach, dedicated to their work, externally warm and inviting.

[[/tab]]
[[tab Agent Sera]]

**Name:** Field Agent Sera

**Voice Actor:** Téa Fazio

**Position:** Field Agent, On-The-Ground Reporter

**Clearance Level:** 2 (Class C)

**Birthday:** December 2^^nd^^, year unknown.

**Strengths:** High Stamina, Fast, Passionate, Good at Improv.

**Weaknesses:** Bad Memory, Nonconformist, Self-Conscious, Perfectionistic.

**Segment:** Field Reports - Transporting to various locations around the world to report on-the-ground events and dangers so that the listeners may be aware of what is happening and ready to handle it themselves.

**Details:** Crow, Mole Teenager, Confidence > Intelligence, Empathetic, enthusiastic, creative, sociable, curious, KARMA.

[[/tab]]
[[tab Tess (7355)]]

**Name:** --D-7355-- Tess

**Voice Actor:** Kit Costello

**Position:** Ex-D-Class Personnel

**Clearance Level:** --Class-D-- 2

**Birthday:** April 1^^st^^, 1999.

**Strengths:** Immortal, Headstrong, Personable (When they want to be).

**Weaknesses:** Headstrong, Holds Grudges, Anger Issues.

**Segment:** Ask-and-Answer - A segment for listeners to (somehow) send in their own questions to Site-230 for Tess to answer live. This section seems to be meant to provide at-need information for the survival of the listeners, but given that the host is immortal, most advice is quite sassy in nature.

**Details:** Angry. Intelligent but prefers to keep it secret. Independent. Externally Self-Assured
[[/tab]]


[[/tabview]]

++ Season 2 Episodes
**Note: You Should Start Here!** The plot is quite different and independent from season 1, and the production value went way up.
[[tabview]]
[[tab 01: Welcome To The XK]]
++++ Overview
[https://open.spotify.com/episode/200zEV3v92R1XEn6ORg1aI?si=01114467d5394fd0 Listen Here on Spotify!] (Other links can be found at the end of this document!)

**Online Release Date:** June 10, 2024

**Duration:** 49:48

**Plot:** Welcome to the XK, those of you who are unfortunate enough to be stuck in what remains of this hell-hole we call Terra! In this introduction episode, join host Site Director Dr. Robin, alongside new Field Agent Sera and Former-D-Class Tess, as they attempt to guide you though this end-of-the-world scenario and come out the other end alive!

++++ Credits

**Duration:** 58:11

**Plot:** The Starlight Knights have failed, and we are suffering for it. Welcome back to the XK, in this episode join the team as they meet a god, answer your questions, and embark to understand exactly how the world ended, all while trying to keep you alive through it all!

++++ Overview
[https://open.spotify.com/episode/1sLfQYXfFuRpfqC9gUftCW?si=c6910a15c8794b35 Listen Here on Spotify!] (Other links can be found at the end of this document!)

**Online Release Date:** June 24, 2024

**Duration:** 59:22

**Plot:** Now, it's Dr. Robin's turn. Welcome back to the XK, where in this episode we will explore Dr. Robin's theory for how the world ended: The underwater life-altering behemoth that is SCP-3069. As well, join Agent Sera as she takes a well-deserved beach vacation at Site 42, and Tess is back to answer your questions and let you in on the site gossip!

**Online Release Date:** July 1, 2024

**Duration:** 54:06

**Plot:** It's time for the end. In every episode prior, the team at Site 230 has been hunting for exactly how the world ended. Well, now, it's time to explore SCP-2000, the thing that should fix it all. Join Dr. Robin, Agent Sera, and Tess as they explore what truly should be the beginning of the end.

**Duration:** 57:06

**Plot:** In this episode, join us with Dr. Robin as we launch this series and welcome you to The Foundation as our newest recruit. In this case, we will describe the lesson plan, and begin with our first SCPs for you to experience.

++ Show Blurb
> Welcome To The XK, those of you lucky enough to be alive still. Hosted by Ex-Site Director Dr. Robin and his team, in this SCP podcast, you'll be guided through the most horrific stories of the apocalypse and the time before it. Join them as they navigate through the wreckage, uncover secrets, and attempt to survive the unimaginable. Get ready for more SCPs, more on-the-ground action, more unexpected twists, and… more hot gossip?
> 
>
> Tune in to your guide against all things anomalous, every Monday at 6 pm Atlantic.

++ Show Info
> //Welcome To The Foundation// is a weekly radio show and podcast hosted out of Fredericton, New Brunswick, themed around trying to keep the world alive after the world has ended.
>
